ygData.subject: RE: Nybright Sisters and taking the lives of our fello w man
ygData.msgSnippet: at 17th, the gargs in both Mistmoore and OOT will con bright red. I was hunting OOT gargs at 22 and 23 in a group, then 24 and 25 solo. I haven t been to MM in
ygData.messageBody:
at 17th, the gargs in both Mistmoore and OOT will con bright red. I was
hunting OOT gargs at 22 and 23 in a group, then 24 and 25 solo. I haven't
been to MM in a bit. but if I remember right, the gargs there are a little
tougher than their OOT cousins.

Praelor Dileasai

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Lombard.Mikhael [SMTP:Mikhael_Lombard@...]
> Sent: Monday, September 13, 1999 1:32 PM
> To: 'EQ-Monks@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Nybright Sisters and taking the lives of our
> fello w man
>
> From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
>
> How hard are the gargoyles in Mist More and where are they at?
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: IBNALNOOR@... [mailto:IBNALNOOR@...]

> To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Nybright Sisters and taking the lives of our
> fellow man
>
>
> From: IBNALNOOR@...
>
> Where are these Gargoyles at and are they as hard as the ones in
> Mistmoore?
> What do they con to you at 17th lvl? I have heard of this Island but I do
> not
> know the Loc. Also, do their eyes sell for 8 plat like the eyes from the
> Gargs in MM?
